TermDesc:
Augusta can hold up to 100 points of Prowess.
- Prowess is obtained when Basic Attack, Heavy Attack - Steelclash, Mid-air Attack, Mid-air Dodge Counter, Resonance Skill - Warrior's Blade, Dodge Counter, or Dodge Counter - Heavy Attack: Steelclash deal damage.
- Casting Intro Skill - Stride of Goldenflare fully restores Prowess.
